    3: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource\Related;
    4:
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk AS Main;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    7: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    8: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model AS Model;
    9: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource AS Resource;
    10:
    11: /** Set callbacks
    12: * @param Object $obj From paths()
    13: * @return Object $obj
    14: */
    15: function Callback (Object $obj) {
    16: $param = param($obj, 'callback');
    17: $local_param = local_param($obj, 'callback');
    18:
    19: $global = (is_string($param)) ? [ $param ] : $param;
    20: $local = (is_string($local_param)) ? [ $local_param ] : $local_param;
    21:
    22: return array_merge(
    23: $global,
    24: $local
    25: );
    26: }
    27:
    28: /** Additonal global CSS links
    29: * @param Object $obj
    30: * @return Array $global_css
    31: */
    32: function Css (Object $obj) {
    33: return array_merge(
    34: param($obj, 'required', 'css'),
    35: local_param($obj, 'required', 'css')
    36: );
    37: }
    38:
    39: /** Combined Object for lib, css, javascript
    40: * @param Object $obj
    41: * @return Object $obj [ 'lib', 'css', 'javascript' ]
    42: */
    43: function Includes(Object $obj) {
    44: return (object) [
    45: 'lib' => Lib($obj),
    46: 'css' => Css($obj),
    47: 'javascript' => Javascript($obj)
    48: ];
    49: }
    50:
    51: /** Additonal global JavaScript
    52: * @param Object $obj
    53: * @return Array $global_javascript
    54: */
    55: function Javascript (Object $obj) {
    56: $arr = array_merge(
    57: param($obj, 'required', 'js'),
    58: local_param($obj, 'required', 'js')
    59: );
    60: return $arr;
    61: }
    62:
    63: /** Return library paths
    64: * @param Object $obj
    65: * @return Object $obj Combined required [ 'include', 'namespace', 'url' ] && [ 'root', 'addon' => [ 'id', 'name', 'root', 'route' ], 'namespace', 'app_url', 'query_delim' ]
    66: */
    67: function Lib (Object $obj) {
    68: $rcsite = Model\RcSite\Load(Resource\paths(), path_info());
    69:
    70: $paths = (object) [
    71: 'root' => $rcsite->Root,
    72: 'addon' => (object)[
    73: 'id' => Resource\Addon\Id(),
    74: 'name' => Env\Param('resource'),
    75: 'root' => $rcsite->AddonDir,
    76: 'route' => path_info()['Offset'].
    77: path_info()['QueryDelim'].
    78: File\ds().
    79: Env\Param('resource')
    80: ],
    81: 'namespace' => Main\app_namespace(),
    82: 'app_url' => path_info()['Offset'],
    83: 'query_delim' => path_info()['QueryDelim']
    84: ];
    85: $paths->addon->url = $paths->app_url.str_replace([$paths->root], [''], $paths->addon->root);
    86:
    87: $ns = implode('\\', [ $paths->namespace, $paths->addon->id ]);
    88:
    89: $paths->required = (object) [
    90: 'include' => include_paths ($paths->addon->root, Resource\DEFAULT_PHP_FILE),
    91: 'namespace' => Namespaces($ns, Null),
    92: 'url' => Urls($paths->addon->url, Null)
    93: ];
    94:
    95: return $paths;
    96: }
    97:
    98: /** Return namespace paths
    99: * @param String $prefix
    100: * @param String $postfix
    101: * @return Array $priority For each priority_array()
    102: */
    103: function Namespaces (String $prefix=NULL, String $postfix=NULL) {
    104: $delim = '\\';
    105: $arr = priority_array($prefix, $postfix);
    106:
    107: return array_map(
    108: function ($i) use ($delim) {
    109: $p = array_map(
    110: function ($j) {
    111: return ucfirst($j);
    112: },
    113: explode(File\ds(), $i)
    114: );
    115:
    116: return rtrim(implode($delim, $p), $delim);
    117: },
    118: $arr
    119: );
    120: }
    121:
    122: /** Return url paths
    123: * @param String $prefix
    124: * @param String $postfix
    125: * @return Array $priority priority_array()
    126: */
    127: function Urls (String $prefix=NULL, String $postfix=NULL) {
    128: return array_map(
    129: function ($i) {
    130: return rtrim($i, File\ds());
    131: },
    132: priority_array($prefix, $postfix)
    133: );
    134: }
    135:
    136: /** Return include file paths
    137: * @param String $prefix
    138: * @param String $postfix
    139: * @return Array $priority priority_array()
    140: */
    141: function include_paths (String $prefix=NULL, String $postfix=NULL) {
    142: return priority_array($prefix, $postfix);
    143: }
    144:
    145: /** Additonal localized parameters
    146: * @param Object $obj
    147: * @param String $param
    148: * @param String $type
    149: * @return Array $local_parameter
    150: */
    151: function local_param(Object $obj, String $param, String $type=NULL) {
    152: if (! $type) {
    153: return ($obj
    154: && property_exists((object) $obj, 'rc')
    155: && isset($obj->rc['local'])
    156: && isset($obj->rc['local'][$param])
    157: )
    158: ? $obj->rc['local'][$param]
    159: : [];
    160: }
    161: return ($obj
    162: && property_exists((object) $obj, 'rc')
    163: && isset($obj->rc['local'])
    164: && isset($obj->rc['local'][$param])
    165: && isset($obj->rc['local'][$param][$type])
    166: )
    167: ? (is_array($obj->rc['local'][$param][$type]))
    168: ? $obj->rc['local'][$param][$type]
    169: : [ $obj->rc['local'][$param][$type] ]
    170: : [];
    171: }
    172:
    173: /** Additonal global parameters
    174: * @param Object $obj
    175: * @param String $param
    176: * @param String $type
    177: * @return Array $global_parameter
    178: */
    179: function param(Object $obj, String $param, String $type=NULL) {
    180: if (! $type) {
    181: return ($obj
    182: && property_exists((object) $obj, 'rc')
    183: && isset($obj->rc[$param])
    184: )
    185: ? (is_array($obj->rc[$param])) ? $obj->rc[$param] : [ $obj->rc[$param] ]
    186: : [];
    187: }
    188: return ($obj
    189: && property_exists((object) $obj, 'rc')
    190: && isset($obj->rc[$param])
    191: && isset($obj->rc[$param][$type])
    192: )
    193: ? $obj->rc[$param][$type]
    194: : [];
    195: }
    196:
    197: /** Return path info from Env\Param && Env\Path
    198: * @return Array $info [ 'Url', 'Offset', 'QueryDelim', 'Query', 'Root' ]
    199: */
    200: function path_info () {
    201: $arr = [];
    202: $arr['Url'] = Env\Param('relative');
    203: $arr['Offset'] = Env\Param('offset');
    204: $arr['QueryDelim'] = Env\Param('query_delim');
    205: $arr['Query'] = Env\Param('query');
    206: $arr['Root'] = Env\Path('root');
    207: return $arr;
    208: }
    209:
    210: /** Verify and load possible modules; if exist
    211: * @return Array $possible_namespaces
    212: */
    213: function possible_paths() {
    214: $pos = Resource\include_path_info();
    215: $pos_inc = is_array($pos->include)
    216: ? $pos->include
    217: : [];
    218: $pos_ns = $pos->namespace;
    219:
    220: foreach ($pos_inc AS $inc) {
    221: if (is_file($inc)) {
    222: include_once($inc);
    223: }
    224: }
    225:
    226: return $pos_ns;
    227: }
    228:
    229: /** Sort resources in priority order (paths, namespaces, urls)
    230: * @param String $prefix
    231: * @param String $postfix
    232: * @return Array $priority Merged resource and element related components
    233: */
    234: function priority_array (String $prefix=NULL, String $postfix=NULL) {
    235: $resource = Env\Param('resource');
    236: $elements = Env\Param('elements');
    237:
    238: $prev = File\ds();
    239: $pos = array_merge([$resource], $elements);
    240: for ($i=0; $i<sizeof($pos); $i++) {
    241: $el = $pos[$i];
    242: $pos[$i] = ($el === $prev) ? $el : $prev.$el.File\ds();
    243: $prev = $pos[$i];
    244: }
    245:
    246: return array_map(function ($i) use ($prefix, $postfix) {
    247: $prefix = (is_null($prefix)) ? '' : $prefix;
    248: $postfix = (is_null($postfix)) ? '' : $postfix;
    249:
    250: return $prefix.$i.$postfix; }, array_reverse($pos));
    251: }
